11.7. Case Study 4: Trend and Seasonality 199
 monthly-car-sales.csv 6
Save the ﬁle with the ﬁlename monthly-car-sales.csv in your current working directory.
We can load this dataset as a Pandas Series using the function read csv() and summarize
the shape of the dataset.
# load
series = read_csv(' monthly-car-sales.csv' , header=0, index_col=0)
# summarize shape
print(series.shape)
Listing 11.47: Example of loading the monthly car sales dataset.
